title: Crashes
body: I am scared to play league of legends, I encounter some disgusting crashes... I was in a game.. This game being ranked and all of a sudden my game crashed, no bugsplat came up nothing, i had to restart my Pc, because it kept telling me This program is already running... When I got back into the game we were still winning yes, we won then after that i was placed in Lower queue for 5 games each for 20mins. Can someone explain?

replies.body:
Your game crashed and caused your absence from the match, which caused you to be flagged by the AFK system, which triggered Leaverbuster due to a *recent trend* of disconnections. Unfortunately, we cannot modify or remove these penalties, so you'll have to play through them *after* we've confirmed your issue is gone.

In order to assist you in troubleshooting this issue, I'll need a few more details about what happened. Did you see any change in your FPS or latency (ping) before the crash occurred? What behavior did you see that let you know this was a crash? With some more details, I'll be able to provide steps in order to find the main cause of this issue.
